High Priest Orven:

We have to prepare to the rite properly.

Go to the Plains of the Lizardmen and kill 1000 monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Tanta Lizardman, Tanta Lizardman Warrior, Tanta Lizardman Berserker, Tanta Lizardman Archer, Tanta Lizardman Summoner.

Come back after dealing with monsters.
